channel.title: [667] Nullpointer :(

item.title: [667] Nullpointer :(
item.dc:creator: @Snackman Snackman
item.description:
@Snackman wrote:

Hello people!

I am trying to get the Pre-game Lobby (when you login) working again on my 667.

It all went well, until I came across the last part, the test.

This part:

public int getMessageAmount() { Integer messageAmount = (Integer) getTemporaryAttributtes().get( "Message"); if (messageAmount == null) return 0; return messageAmount; }

	Integer messageAmount = (Integer) getTemporaryAttributtes().get(
			"Message");

gives me this error:

If any of you can help me with this, please do so!

Thanks in advance,
Snackman.

Read full topic
